alterniumInfo.name: Omerta
alterniumInfo.description: Inflicts DMG Taken AMP +15% debuff for 8 s to targets hit by Special Skill and +25% to Mechs instead. Delivers 4 enhanced attacks with 150% damage after casting Special Skill.

reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Rita Arsenico is a flying backline utility damage dealer with a variety of debuffs. She applies ASPD, ATK and Incoming Healing debuffs all of which are stronger against mech enemies.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Rita’s ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Alternium Reactor","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" adds DMG AMP debuff to her kit and, more importantly, changes the amount of enhanced attacks after special from 1 to 4. This massively increases her damage output in every scenario and allows her to effectively permanently stun all mechs in AoE of her enhanced attacks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVE, Rita is a debuffer/ damage dealer hybrid thanks to her true damage and DMG AMP%/ -ATK% debuff. While serviceable in most content, she shines against mech enemies thanks to innate Anti-Mech DMG and increased debuff potency on Mechs. This makes her one of the best debuffers in Inhibitor. Rita’s ability to frequently stun mech enemies gives her a strong niche against any stunnable mech enemies (e.g. Challenge 3-15, Swift Trimming Room 1).\t\t","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In PVP, Rita sees universal use as a cheap damage dealer. Her short range and vulnerability to anti-air priority units give her exploitable weaknesses, but damage output and offensive utility she provides make her an attractive option for most teams. Additionally, her anti-mech properties make her an existential threat for any mech-focused team.\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: An offensive supporter that's especially effective against Mechs.

introduction.introduction:
Rita Arsenico is a Supporter who commands her alter ego Omertà to repel enemies. Her ability to control metal is especially threatening to Mech units.

  She wouldn't admit to this, but she's a main contributor to Horizon Finance's ruthless reputation among its customers, who can't help but cooperate in the face of her glaring eyes and intimidating tone of voice. According to a bartender at her favorite bar, Rita's customers range from heinous criminals to lawyers, a curious combination that hints at an interesting past.

pve.notes: Works best on Spectral Spirit if you are using Shadow Palace gear.

pvp.notes: Works best on Spectral Spirit if you are using Shadow Palace gear.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Shapes Omerta into a sword and throws it at the front, inflicting AoE damage.

Delivers an enhanced Basic attack after Special and Ultimate skills, inflicting 50% more AoE damage on and around a target. The affected enemies lose 15% of ATK for 5 seconds, and this value is doubled for Mechs.

level5.level5: Additional Mech DMG RES +30% (outside the Gauntlet). Enhanced attacks inflict true DMG. Stuns Mechs for 2 seconds.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Shapes Omerta into an ax and throws it at the front, inflicting AoE damage on and around a target. The affected enemies lose 20% of Incoming Healing for 8 seconds, and this value is doubled for Mechs.

level5.level5: Instantly finishes 1 Mech with 20% or lower HP within range (Bosses excluded)

baseDescription.baseDescription: Angry Omerta inflicts AoE damage on and around a target. Cancels all non-Permanent buffs cast on the affected Mechs and negates new buffs on them for 45 seconds.

level5.level5: Affected enemies' ASPD -25% for 12 s (2x on Mechs)
